entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 06:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Temperature: -8.5°C

Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
